agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: County Affairs TIME & DATE: During reading and referral of bills Tuesday, March 26, 2019 PLACE: 3W.15 CHAIR: Rep. Garnet Coleman The Committee will meet upon adjournment or during reading and referral of bills, if permission is granted, to discuss pending business. Notice of this meeting was announced from the House floor.
